banner.title: IT Services
banner.subtitle: Empowering the future through technology education and training

it.description: Our IT department offers comprehensive training programs designed to equip individuals with modern technical skills. From web development to software engineering, we provide quality education that prepares students for successful careers in technology.

courses.title: Amazon Private Label (FBA)
courses.description: Master Amazon FBA business from product research, sourcing, listing optimization to launching your own private label brand.

courses.title: Shopify E-commerce
courses.description: Build and manage professional online stores with Shopify. Learn store setup, themes, apps, and marketing strategies.

courses.title: Python AI Chatbot Development
courses.description: Learn to build intelligent AI chatbots using Python. Master NLP, machine learning, and integrate with platforms like WhatsApp, Telegram, and web applications.

it.summerCamp: Special intensive training program for students during summer break with hands-on coding projects, robotics workshops, and digital skills development.

banner.title: Medical Center
banner.subtitle: Quality healthcare services for the community

medical.description: Our medical center provides accessible, affordable healthcare services with experienced doctors and modern facilities. We offer a wide range of medical services including general OPD, specialist consultations, dental care, eye care, and laboratory services.

doctors.name: Dr. Ahmed
doctors.timing: Mon, Wed, Fri (6 PM - 8 PM & 11 AM - 1 PM)

doctors.name: Dr. Sohail
doctors.timing: Mon to Thu, Sat (5 PM - 8 PM)

partnerHospitals.name: Shed Hospital
partnerHospitals.description: Free OPD consultation for all Khawajgan members

partnerHospitals.name: Abdul Samad Hospital
partnerHospitals.description: Free surgical operations and delivery cases for Khawajgan members

education.description: Various educational programs and support services to promote learning and academic excellence.

programs.title: Tutoring Services
programs.description: One-on-one and group tutoring for various subjects

programs.title: Adult Education
programs.description: Literacy programs and skill development for adults

programs.title: Library Services
programs.description: Books, digital resources, and study spaces

sports.description: Experience top-notch sports facilities at affordable rates. Our modern sports complex offers Badminton, Cricket, Snooker, and Pool with professional-grade equipment and well-maintained playing areas.

facilities.title: Badminton Court
facilities.description: Professional indoor badminton courts with quality flooring, proper lighting, and all equipment available.

facilities.title: Cricket Net
facilities.description: Practice your batting and bowling in our well-maintained cricket nets with professional setup.

facilities.title: Snooker Table
facilities.description: Premium snooker tables with professional cues and accessories. Perfect for casual games or serious practice.

facilities.title: Pool Table
facilities.description: Enjoy a game of pool on our well-maintained tables. Great for friends and family entertainment.

banner.title: Banquet Halls
banner.subtitle: Elegant venues for your memorable occasions

banquets.description: Host your weddings, receptions, corporate events, and family gatherings in our beautifully designed banquet halls. We offer premium venues with excellent catering services to make your events truly special.

halls.name: Tehseena Banquet
halls.description: Our premium banquet hall perfect for grand weddings and large celebrations. Features elegant décor, spacious dance floor, and state-of-the-art sound system.

halls.name: Iqbal Arena
halls.description: Versatile venue ideal for weddings, corporate events, and social gatherings. Complete catering packages available with delicious menu options.

halls.name: Abdul Lateef Hall
halls.description: Comfortable and affordable venue for medium-sized events. Perfect for family functions, engagement ceremonies, and community events.

banner.title: Graveyard Services
banner.subtitle: Dignified and respectful final resting place

graveyard.description: Peaceful and well-maintained resting place with complete burial services.

services.title: Burial Plots
services.description: Available for reservation or immediate use
